definition: (of a man) to dress as a woman (idiom)
male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
to disguise oneself as/to dress up/to play (a role)/to put on (an expression)
archaic variant of 汝[ru3]
female/woman/daughter
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: According to a police report, Burrow was dressed as a woman and wearing a wig.
sentences.chinese: 根据警方报告，柏洛男扮女装，还戴假发。

sentences.english: Shawn and Marlon Wayans According to the movies, FBI agents are always dressing in drag.
sentences.chinese: 通过电影会发现FBI探员经常男扮女装。

sentences.english: The first time I dressed up as a woman was Hallowe'en1).
sentences.chinese: 我第一次男扮女装是在一次万圣节前夕。

sentences.english: He disguised himself as a girl with a false long hair.
sentences.chinese: 他戴上假长发套男扮女装。

sentences.english: The first time I dressed up as a woman was Hallowe'en.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次男扮女装是在一次万圣节前夕。

sentences.english: According to the movies, FBI agents are always dressing in drag.
sentences.chinese: 通过电影会发现FBI探员经常男扮女装。

definition: (of a woman) to dress as a man (idiom)
(Chinese opera) to play a role outside of one's specialty/(modern) to play a transvestite role/to masquerade as an opponent
stage costume
women's clothes
to disguise oneself as/to dress up/to play (a role)/to put on (an expression)
to dress up and make up (like an actor)
to seduce/to lead into sex
transvestism
men's clothes
transvestite/transsexual/ladyboy
clown role in opera/clown/buffoon
ancient costume/period costume (in movies etc)
(Internet slang) shocking/appalling/terrifying/terrific
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to play the fool (idiom)/to feign madness
spoof (web-based genre in PRC, acquiring cult status from 2005, involving humorous, satirical or fantastical videos, photo collections, texts, poems etc)
